answers.text: Edge locations exist separately to AWS Regions.
AWS Wavelength is deployed in each Availability Zone.
AWS Local Zone is an extension of an AWS Region.
An edge location contains multiple Availability Zones.
AWS Outposts only work in AWS Regions.
Edge Locations are placed only in AWS Regions.
An AWS Region contains multiple Availability Zones.
